channel.title: Introduction :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides So far, we’ve worked with many different programming structures, including functions, if statements, loops, and more. However, so far we’ve been a bit limited in how much data we can easily store. This is because a traditional variable can only store one value at a time! If we want to store lots of data, it would be much easier if we had a way to store it in a structured way so that we can access it using a single variable name and possibly some other identifier.
